title: Anyone noticed we lack a Superhero champion?
body:
Closest thing we have character-wise is Galio.

By Superhero I mean a champion who starts off as a normal guy/gal but later there's some accident that gave him/her superhuman powers, and uses them for good.

Also, this kind of champion is perfect for a truly positive personality, regardless of their personal problems (some Spiderman-like attitude), which we noticeably don't have in league.

They could make them from Piltover or Zaun, or even Ionia if their powers come from magic. Or, if they want to really get creative, they could make him/her Noxian to have a truly "good" Noxian champion for a change.
